movie.title: Correspondence
movie.description_intro: Focused on the relationship between an astronomer and his lover, who spend their years apart.
movie.description_full: Focused on the relationship between an astronomer and his lover, who spend their years apart.

movies.title: The Enemy Below
movies.summary: During World War II, the USS Haynes, an American destroyer escort discovers a German U-boat in the South Atlantic. A deadly duel between the two ships ensues, and Captain Murrell must draw upon all his experience to defeat the equally experienced German commander.
movies.description_full: During World War II, the USS Haynes, an American destroyer escort discovers a German U-boat in the South Atlantic. A deadly duel between the two ships ensues, and Captain Murrell must draw upon all his experience to defeat the equally experienced German commander.
movies.synopsis: During World War II, the USS Haynes, an American destroyer escort discovers a German U-boat in the South Atlantic. A deadly duel between the two ships ensues, and Captain Murrell must draw upon all his experience to defeat the equally experienced German commander.

movies.title: The Refuge
movies.summary: Markus Hunter, a getaway driver/gunman (Keith Sutliff), lives a solitary life in Los Angeles California doing jobs around town and across the world. Known for his excellent reputation as a driver/gunman, a former employer of his, Frank, contracts him for a job involving casino heist money from a debt that was never paid to him. After making a few contacts, Markus ends up recruiting some help from a nearby colleague (Watts) of his which he's done many jobs with in the past. Things don't go according to plan for Markus, leading to people looking for him, his known associates, and the only person he trusts in life (Staci). As the story unfolds, Markus attempts to sort out the chaos leading to more turmoil. Markus comes to realize he must make the ultimate decision which matters most to him in life.

movies.title: Saviors
movies.summary: A young woman embeds herself in a white power group in order to find her adoptive African-American mother, but one night after the group returns from a rally they test her allegiance. Shot in a single, continuous take.
movies.description_full: A young woman embeds herself in a white power group in order to find her adoptive African-American mother, but one night after the group returns from a rally they test her allegiance. Shot in a single, continuous take.
movies.synopsis: A young woman embeds herself in a white power group in order to find her adoptive African-American mother, but one night after the group returns from a rally they test her allegiance. Shot in a single, continuous take.

movies.title: Silent House
movies.summary: Sarah as she and her dad go to their lakeside retreat to pack things up, as it's being sold. Her uncle also helps out.getting the place ready. When her uncle leaves to get an electrician to check the wiring, Sara hears noises sees what she believes are people inside the house. Soon, she and her dad are attacked by someone - or something, and they end up in a fight for their lives. But there's something more sinister going on.
